content.html: Every year, like clockwork, I go on the @changelog podcast in the fall. This was the third year, and we talked with @adamstac and @jerodsanto about how the market for software engineers. And how things might not be as bad as they seem. The full episode: changelog.com/podcast/516
content.value:
Every year, like clockwork, I go on the @changelog podcast in the fall. This was the third year, and we talked with @adamstac and @jerodsanto about how the market for software engineers. And how things might not be as bad as they seem.

The full episode:

changelog.com/podcast/516
